51-year-old Caucasian female.context: The patient is a 51-year-old Caucasian female with a history of a nasopharyngeal mass discovered with patient's chief complaint of nasal congestion and chronic ear disease.

right upper lid skin lesion.context: Preoperative Diagnoses: 2. Right upper lid skin lesion.

Functional endoscopic sinus surgery.context: Procedures Performed: 1. Functional endoscopic sinus surgery.

excision of nasopharyngeal mass via endo.context: Procedures Performed: 2. Excision of nasopharyngeal mass via endoscopic technique.

excision of right upper lid skin lesion.context: Procedures Performed: 3. Excision of right upper lid skin lesion 1 cm in diameter with adjacent tissue transfer closure.

nasal congestion.context: The patient had a chief complaint of nasal congestion and chronic ear disease.

chronic ear disease.context: The patient had a chief complaint of nasal congestion and chronic ear disease.

cholesterol granuloma.context: The patient also has had this right upper lid skin lesion which appears to be a cholesterol granuloma for numerous months.

irregularly bordered.context: It appears to be growing in size and is irregularly bordered.

growing in size.context: It appears to be growing in size and is irregularly bordered.

severely deviated nasal septum.context: There appeared to be a spur on the left inferior aspect and also on the right posterior aspect. The nasopharyngeal mass appeared polypoid in nature almost lymphoid tissue looking.

spur on the left inferior aspect.context: There appeared to be a spur on the left inferior aspect and also on the right posterior aspect.

spur on the right posterior aspect.context: There appeared to be a spur on the left inferior aspect and also on the right posterior aspect.

polypoid in nature almost lymphoid tissu.context: The nasopharyngeal mass appeared polypoid in nature almost lymphoid tissue looking.

torus tubarius.context: The torus tubarius was noted on the left side with the polypoid lymphoid tissue involving this area completely.

polypoid lymphoid tissue.context: The torus tubarius was noted on the left side with the polypoid lymphoid tissue involving this area completely.

straight biter.context: Prior to taking down this lesion with the XPS, multiple biopsies were taken with a straight biter.

XPS blade.context: The lesion was then removed on the right side with the XPS blade.

cocaine-soaked cottonoid.context: A cocaine-soaked cottonoid was placed back in the patient's left nasal passage region and the nasopharynx.

Merocels.context: Bilateral Merocels and bacitracin-coated ointment were placed.

bacitracin-coated ointment.context: Bilateral Merocels and bacitracin-coated ointment were placed.

Keflex 500 mg.context: The patient will be sent home with a prescription for Keflex 500 mg one p.o. b.i.d, and Tylenol #3 one to two p.o. q.4-6h.

Tylenol #3.context: The patient will be sent home with a prescription for Keflex 500 mg one p.o. b.i.d, and Tylenol #3 one to two p.o. q.4-6h.
